snippet: A crucial decision that keeps Detroit in bankruptcy court and puts pensions at risk can immediately be appealed to a higher court, a judge said.
abstract: Judge Steve W Rhodes of United States Bankruptcy Court says his crucial decision that keeps Detroit in bankruptcy court and puts pensions at risk can immediately be appealed to higher court.
lead_paragraph: A crucial decision that keeps Detroit in bankruptcy court and puts pensions at risk can immediately be appealed to a higher court, a judge said.
